description: A vulnerability was found in BlackVue App 3.65 on Android. It has been classified as problematic. This affects the function deviceDelete of the component API Handler. The manipulation leads to use of get request method with sensitive query strings. It is possible to initiate the attack remotely. The complexity of an attack is rather high. The exploitability is told to be difficult. The exploit has been disclosed to the public and may be used. The vendor was contacted early about this disclosure but did not respond in any way.
